comment: Relatively easy class. The main assignments were weekly discussions. 70% of your final grade though is 3 "quizzes" and the midterm and final, but they're open-note and all pretty easy as long as you prepare. Great guy, met him at the corporate events we were required to attend. The only annoying part of the class was waiting ages to get grades back

Meeting Dr. Jackson has been the greatest blessing of my college career. I've taken 3 of his classes and am involved in the HLC. He has provided the most amazing support to every student he meets with excellent career opportunities to offer in the hospitality industry. Anyone interested in hospitality at KSU should definitely get connected with him

He is an Angel sent from the heavens. SUPER involved with creating careers for students in the hospitality industry, has many connections everywhere you can think of. Class itself has 2 weekly discussions and around 3 quizzes, 2 exams (midterm/final). As long as you do the work and participate, you'll do great :)

Dr. Jackson is great! The class is mostly discussion posts, which can be time consuming. There are very few quizzes or tests, but they are all pretty easy. He really cares about his students' futures and wants to help you succeed as much as possible. If you're looking for a career in hospitality, take Dr. Jackson for sure!!

Wow! Professor Jackson is an amazing teacher who really cares about his students. If you want a job ANYWHERE in the hotel industry, he will do what he can to help make that happen. Teaching is his passion and you can tell. I missed about 6 classes and still got a 100 on my attendance. Discussions are sometimes a lot but he is so worth it. Take him!

He is such an incredible professor. Best personality ever and does a perfect job of combining textbook material and real-world situations into the course. Has such a strong passion for the hospitality and tourism industry and has been a great help in getting me started with my major/career. Couldn't recommend him more!
This was the best class I had all semester. Awesome teacher who combined the textbook and real-world situations in a perfect blend! Great person!

Dr. Jackson is an incredible professor! He truly cares about his students and wants to see them succeed. There's a bit of reading in his class, but the material is light so you can get through it. Don't be scared to ask questions if you're confused or need some guidance, he is always willing to help and his very positive! Take!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Best professor I have had at Kennesaw. His lectures lean heavily on his experiences in the real world of business. There are his test are all online and not difficult at all. He is very interactive with students and this was the one class I enjoyed to go to. Great all round man and cares about your future in business.

Dr. Jackson has been one of my favorite professors I have had. He loves what he does and you can tell it through his lectures. He is funny and can brighten your day the second you walk in his class. He is personable and creates relationships with each student and willing to help you succeed and grow. He is honestly just the best.

The tests were all online. You don't have to read the textbook or come to class to get an A, but he makes the material applicable and enjoyable to learn. He is enthusiastic about teaching and cares to personally know his students. There are weekly discussion posts and you have to respond to 2 people but other than that it's just tests and quizzes.

Best professor at KSU!! He cares about his students, and makes the information relatable! He is always understanding and tries to help you with your future. He genuinely cares and doesnt grade hard. He tries to connect with every student. The class was fun and inspiring

BEST. PROFESSOR. He takes attendance but is very understanding. Quizzes are easy. Discussion boards, attendance, quizzes, midterm and final are the only grades. He is hilarious and will help you find a job outside of KSU. Just an amazing person and professor.

All of the test material is on quizlet and none of the tests are difficult. He's an amazing professor take him if you can. Hospitality management was a great business elective. You won't need the textbook.

BEST TEACHER! Professor Jackson is a respectable, passionate and a funny professor who genuinely wants what's best for his students. He hooked me up with a internship and I will be forever grateful for him. He teachers you college to career content and he is the reason I wanted to start in business. He loves what he does and It's obvious. TAKE HIM!
